title: Game-changing 2026 starts with us

title: Four Strategic Investment Themes for Long-Term Wealth Building in 2026
description: Investment experts identify four key themes for long-term wealth building in 2026: artificial intelligence with nearly ₹90 billion in planned global investments and India's sovereign AI model launch, EV charging infrastructure addressing the gap where 45% of owners rely on public charging, office workspace solutions driven by expanding Global Capability Centers, and luxury consumption fueled by India's rising middle class and urbanization trends.

title: Extremely disturbing, shocking: HC on morphed photos of Shilpa Shetty; orders deletion and removal
description: The Bombay High Court on Friday termed as 'extremely disturbing and shocking' the AI (artificial intelligence)-generated and morphed photos of actor Shilpa Shetty, and directed several social media platforms to forthwith delete and remove all such links and websites.

title: AI model may help make liposuction safer
description: A newly developed artificial intelligence (AI) model is highly accurate in predicting blood loss in patients undergoing high-volume liposuction, reports a study in the January issue of Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery, the official medical journal of the American Society of Plastic Surgeons.
